mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD

/* NOTICE_BOARD_LIST */ SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID ASC) RNUM , BOARD_ID , MEM_ID , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITING_DT , BOARD_UPDT_DT , NTBD_AF_ID , BOARD_CNTNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID ASC ) T WHERE RNUM >= (((#{page}-1)* #{pageRowCnt})+1) AND RNUM <= (#{page} * #{pageRowCnt})
/* NOTICE_BOARD detailPost */ SELECT BOARD_ID ,MEM_ID ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_WRITING_DT ,BOARD_UPDT_DT ,NTBD_AF_ID ,BOARD_CNTNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
